def_en: Someone who is fluent in a particular language can speak the language easily and correctly. You can also say that someone speaks fluent French, Chinese, or some other language.

def_cn: (语言或文字)流畅的，熟练的;文笔好的
def_en: If your speech, reading, or writing is fluent, you speak, read, or write easily, smoothly, and clearly with no mistakes.
